title: Canonical Governance Stage Definitions
description: Defines the canonical, strictly-enforced stage identifiers (S-IDs) used throughout the Sovereign AGI pipeline, serving as both configuration baseline and validation schema.

stages.description: Strict mapping of required Stage IDs to their properties.

const.name: State Certification
const.description: Certified input state artifact (Psi_N) hashing and commitment.

const.name: Cost Modeling
const.description: Execution of S02 Cost/Failure Profile Assessment.

const.name: Stability Veto Gate
const.description: Stability Analysis and Dynamic Range Check.

const.name: Context Attestation
const.description: Validation of external and environmental context parameters.

const.name: Behavioral Divergence Veto
const.description: Check against known divergence signatures and anomalous behavior.

const.name: Axiom Execution (P-01)
const.description: GAX computes P-01 decision (Utility > Cost + Epsilon).

const.name: NRALS Logging
const.description: SGS records the transition outcome in the Non-Repudiable Audit Log System (NRALS).

const.name: GICM Finalization
const.description: CRoT signs the Governance Inter-Agent Commitment Manifest (GICM).

const.name: State Commit
const.description: Commitment of the next state artifact (Psi_N+1) prior to execution.
